translation.source: The fundamental theorem of calculus relates differentiation and integration.
translation.target: Àkàwé ìpilẹ̀ kálkúlọ̀sì ṣe àlàyé ìbáṣepọ̀ ìyàsọ́tọ̀ àti ìtẹ́gùn.

translation.source: The determinant of a square matrix can be used to determine if the matrix has an inverse.
translation.target: A lè lo détẹ́miná mátríìsì aláriwọ́ láti pinnu bóyá mátríìsì náà ní ìdojúkọ.

translation.source: An obtuse angle is greater than 90 degrees but less than 180 degrees.
translation.target: Igun fífẹ̀ tóbi ju àléfà mẹ́sàn-án (90) lọ ṣùgbọ́n ó kéré ju àléfà ọgọ́jọ (180) lọ.

translation.source: The circumference of a circle is given by 2πr.
translation.target: Odi-ẹ̀ká jẹ́ 2πr.

translation.source: An even function satisfies f(-x) = f(x) for all x in its domain.
translation.target: Ìfà onídàají gba f(-x) = f(x) fún gbogbo x nínú àbújá rẹ̀.

translation.source: The indefinite integral of a function is a family of functions.
translation.target: Ìbúpa aláìlápinpé ìfà kan jẹ́ ẹbí àwọn ìfà.

translation.source: A bipartite graph can have its vertices divided into two disjoint sets such that every edge connects a vertex in one set to a vertex in the other set.
translation.target: Àwòrán ìpínméjì le ní àwọn tẹ́tẹ́ rẹ̀ pínpín sí àwọn ìtò méjì alájẹsọ tó bẹ́ẹ̀ tí gbogbo etí sọ tẹ́tẹ́ nínú ìtò kan pọ̀ mọ́ tẹ́tẹ́ nínú ìtò mìíràn.

translation.source: An even function satisfies f(-x) = f(x) for all x in its domain.
translation.target: Ìfà onírúurú mú f(-x) = f(x) ṣẹ fún gbogbo x nínú àdúgbò rẹ̀.

translation.source: A differential equation is an equation involving derivatives of a function.
translation.target: Ọ̀mì-ìyàtọ̀sọ́tọ̀ jẹ́ ọ̀mì tí ó ní àwọn dérífátífù ìfà.

translation.source: An irrational number cannot be expressed as the quotient of two integers.
translation.target: Òòkà àìdéédé kò le jẹ́ àfihàn gẹ́gẹ́ bí ìpín méjì òòkà odidi.

translation.source: The equation of a circle with center (h, k) and radius r is (x - h)² + (y - k)² = r².
translation.target: Ọ̀mì ẹ̀ká pẹ̀lú àárín (h, k) àti igbó r jẹ́ (x - h)² + (y - k)² = r².

translation.source: The derivative of x^n is n × x^(n-1).
translation.target: Déríféétífù x^n jẹ́ n × x^(n-1).

translation.source: A strategy is a complete plan of action in game theory.
translation.target: Ìlànà-ẹ̀rí jẹ́ ètò pípé ìgbéṣẹ̀ nínú ẹ̀kọ́ ere.

translation.source: Division by zero is undefined.
translation.target: Pípín pẹ̀lú òdo kò ní ìtumọ̀.

translation.source: Perpendicular lines have slopes that are negative reciprocals of each other.
translation.target: Àwọn ìlà ìdúró jí ní àwọn gẹ̀rẹ́ tí jẹ́ ìdàpadà òdiwọ̀n ara wọn.

translation.source: Calculate the area of this rectangle.
translation.target: Ṣèṣirò òrò àkòdì yìí.

translation.source: A Fibonacci sequence is defined by F₀ = 0, F₁ = 1, and Fₙ = Fₙ₋₁ + Fₙ₋₂ for n > 1.
translation.target: Ìtẹ̀lé Fíbónáṣì ni a ṣàlàyé bíi F₀ = 0, F₁ = 1, àti Fₙ = Fₙ₋₁ + Fₙ₋₂ fún n > 1.

translation.source: Calculate the perimeter of a square with side length 5 cm.
translation.target: Ṣèṣirò àyíká eéyà aláríwọ́ pẹ̀lú ìgùn 5 cm.

translation.source: A cube has six faces, eight vertices, and twelve edges.
translation.target: Ìgọ̀n ní ẹ̀gbẹ́ mẹ́fà, igun mẹ́jọ, àti etí méjìlá.

translation.source: The complement of a set A, denoted A', contains all elements in the universal set that are not in A.
translation.target: Àkúnlé ìtò A, tí a fì àmì hàn A', ní gbogbo àwọn èròjà nínú ìtò àkáríayé tí kò sí nínú A.

translation.source: Area is measured in square units.
translation.target: A wọn òrò ní àwọn ìdíwọ̀n aláriwọ́.

translation.source: The derivative of a constant is zero.
translation.target: Déríféétífù óǹkà díẹ̀ jẹ́ òdo.

translation.source: The probability of an impossible event is 0.
translation.target: Ìṣeéṣe ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ àìṣeéṣe jẹ́ 0.

translation.source: The factorial of a non-negative integer n, denoted n!, is the product of all positive integers less than or equal to n.
translation.target: Ìṣesí òòkà odidi aláìdọ́wọ́lé n, tí a fì àmì hàn n!, jẹ́ ìsọdipúpọ̀ gbogbo àwọn òòkà odidi dáradára tí ó kéré ju tàbí dọ́gba pẹ̀lú n.

translation.source: Probability is a measure of the likelihood that an event will occur.
translation.target: Ìṣeéṣe jẹ́ ìwọ̀n ìṣeéṣe pé ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ kan yóò ṣẹlẹ̀.

translation.source: A directed graph has edges with a specific direction.
translation.target: Àwòrán atọ́sọ́nà ní àwọn etí pẹ̀lú ìhà pàtó.

translation.source: The quadratic formula is used to solve quadratic equations.
translation.target: Ìlànà-onírìnméjì ni a ńlo láti yanjú àwọn ọ̀mì-onírìnméjì.

translation.source: The area of a circle is π multiplied by the square of the radius.
translation.target: Òrò ẹ̀ká jẹ́ π lọ́nà ìsọdipúpọ̀ pẹ̀lú onírìnméjì igbó.

translation.source: The discriminant of a quadratic equation ax² + bx + c = 0 is b² - 4ac.
translation.target: Ìdánilọ́tọ̀ ọ̀mì-onírìnméjì ax² + bx + c = 0 jẹ́ b² - 4ac.

translation.source: A cycle in a graph is a path that starts and ends at the same vertex.
translation.target: Àyídà nínú àwòrán jẹ́ ọ̀nà tí ó bẹ̀rẹ̀ tí ó sì parí ní tẹ́tẹ́ kannáà.

translation.source: A chromatic number of a graph is the minimum number of colors needed to color its vertices such that no adjacent vertices have the same color.
translation.target: Òòkà àwọ̀jíjà àwòrán jẹ́ iye kéréjùlọ àwọn àwọ̀ tí a nílò láti kun àwọn tẹ́tẹ́ rẹ̀ tó bẹ́ẹ̀ tí kò sí àwọn tẹ́tẹ́ tímọ́ tí ó ní àwọ̀ kannáà.

translation.source: A scalene triangle has no equal sides.
translation.target: Anígunmẹ́ta aláìdọ́gba kò ní ẹ̀gbẹ́ kan tó dọ́gba.

translation.source: Division is sharing a number into equal parts.
translation.target: Pínpín jẹ́ pípin òòkà kan sí àwọn ìpín dọ́gba.

translation.source: Parallel lines never intersect.
translation.target: Àwọn ilà ọgbà kò ní í pàdé láéláé.

translation.source: A Hamilton circuit is a path that visits each vertex of a graph exactly once and returns to the starting vertex.
translation.target: Àyíká Hámíltọ́nù jẹ́ ọ̀nà tí ó bẹ tẹ́tẹ́ kọ̀ọ̀kan àwòrán wò ẹ̀ẹ̀kan pàtó tí ó sì padà sí tẹ́tẹ́ ìbẹ̀rẹ̀.

translation.source: In a geometric sequence, each term is found by multiplying the previous term by a constant.
translation.target: Nínú ìṣísẹ̀lẹ̀ onírísí-ìsirò, a rí ìpín kọ̀ọ̀kan nípa sísọdipúpọ̀ ìpín tí ó ṣáájú pẹ̀lú óǹkà díẹ̀.

translation.source: The sum of two odds is always even.
translation.target: Àpapọ̀ òǹkà èèkà méjì jẹ́ onídàají nígbà gbogbo.

translation.source: A limit is the value that a function approaches as the input approaches some value.
translation.target: Òdíwọ̀n jẹ́ iye tí ìfà kan ṣúnmọ́ bí ìwọlé ṣe ńṣúnmọ́ iye kan.

translation.source: The gradient of a curve at a point is the slope of the tangent to the curve at that point.
translation.target: Àdáni kọ́ńfù ní ojúami kan jẹ́ gẹ̀rẹ̀gẹ̀rẹ̀ dotun sí kọ́ńfù náà ní ojúami náà.

translation.source: The supplement of an angle is 180 degrees minus the angle.
translation.target: Àkúnlétò igun jẹ́ ọgọ́ọ̀rùn-ún ó lé ọgọ́tin àléfà dín igun.

translation.source: A local minimum is a point where the function value is less than at nearby points.
translation.target: Àkéréjùlọ abẹ́lé jẹ́ ojú níbi tí iye ìfà kéré ju ti àwọn ojú tímọ́.

translation.source: A rhombus is a quadrilateral with all sides equal.
translation.target: Àkòdì-títẹ̀ jẹ́ onímẹ́rin tí gbogbo ẹgbẹ́ rẹ̀ dọ́gba.

translation.source: The area of a rhombus is half the product of its diagonals.
translation.target: Òrò àkòdì-títẹ̀ jẹ́ ìdajì ẹ̀sún àwọn eyítẹlẹ rẹ̀.

translation.source: Variance is the square of the standard deviation.
translation.target: Ìyàtọ̀tọ̀ jẹ́ aláriwọ́ àgbátẹnu-kúrò déédéé.

translation.source: Zero is neither positive nor negative.
translation.target: Òdo kì í ṣe àpọnlé tàbí àdínà.

translation.source: In a triangle, the sum of all angles is 180 degrees.
translation.target: Nínú anígunmẹ́ta, àpapọ̀ gbogbo igun jẹ́ àléfà ọgọ́ọ̀rún ó lé ọgọ́rin.

translation.source: The derivative of xⁿ is n·xⁿ⁻¹.
translation.target: Dérífátífù xⁿ jẹ́ n·xⁿ⁻¹.

translation.source: The total surface area of a cube is 6a², where a is the length of an edge.
translation.target: Àtọ̀wọ́dà òrò ìgọ̀n jẹ́ 6a², níbi tí a jẹ́ gígùn etí kan.

translation.source: A vector has both magnitude and direction.
translation.target: Fẹ́ktọ̀ ní ìwọ̀n àti ìkọ́ méjèèjì.

translation.source: A point has no dimensions.
translation.target: Ojúami kò ní àwọn ìwọ̀n.

translation.source: An asymptote is a line that a curve approaches but never touches.
translation.target: Àfọsẹ̀ jẹ́ ìlà tí kọ́fù kan ṣúnmọ́ ṣùgbọ́n kò lè fọwọ́kan.

translation.source: The product of any number and zero is zero.
translation.target: Ẹ̀sún èyíkéyìí nọ́mbà àti òdo jẹ́ òdo.

translation.source: The absolute value of a number is its distance from zero.
translation.target: Iye àṣemáṣekí òǹkà kan jẹ́ ìjìnnà rẹ̀ láti òdo.

translation.source: A decimal number can be expressed as a fraction.
translation.target: Nọ́mbà ẹsẹ le jẹ́ ìfihàn gẹ́gẹ́ bí ìdàsíwẹ́wẹ́.

translation.source: A permutation is an arrangement of a set of objects in a specific order.
translation.target: Àtòsípo jẹ́ ìtò ìtò àwọn nkan ní ṣíṣe pàtó.

translation.source: A first-order differential equation involves only the first derivative of the function.
translation.target: Ọ̀mì-ìyàtọ̀sọ́tọ̀ ìpele-àkọ́kọ́ ní dérífátífù àkọ́kọ́ ìfà náà nìkan.

translation.source: To simplify a fraction, divide the numerator and denominator by their greatest common factor.
translation.target: Láti sọ ìdàsíwẹ́wẹ́ di rírọ̀, pín ètò-òkè àti ètò-ìsàlẹ̀ pẹ̀lú ìfipín nlá àjọní wọn.

translation.source: A function is decreasing if its derivative is negative.
translation.target: Ìfà jẹ́ àdínkù tí déríféétífù rẹ̀ bá jẹ́ àdínà.

translation.source: The absolute value of a number is its distance from zero on the number line.
translation.target: Iye ajukájú òòkà kan jẹ́ ìjìnnà rẹ̀ láti òdo lórí ìlà-òòkà.

translation.source: The hypotenuse is the longest side of a right-angled triangle.
translation.target: Hypotenuse jẹ́ ẹ̀gbẹ́ tó gùn jù nínú anígunmẹ́ta onígun-ọ̀tún.

translation.source: An equilateral triangle has three equal sides.
translation.target: Anígunmẹ́ta dọ́gba ní ẹ̀gbẹ́ mẹ́ta dọ́gba.

translation.source: A graph in graph theory consists of vertices and edges.
translation.target: Àwòrán nínú ẹ̀kọ́ àwòrán jẹ́ àkójọ àwọn tẹ́tẹ́ àti etí.

translation.source: Parallel lines have the same slope.
translation.target: Àwọn ìlà ọgbà ní gẹ̀rẹ́ kannáà.

translation.source: A local maximum is a point where the function value is greater than at nearby points.
translation.target: Àgbàjùlọ abẹ́lé jẹ́ ojú níbi tí iye ìfà tóbi ju ti àwọn ojú tímọ́.

translation.source: A function is a relation that assigns exactly one output to each input.
translation.target: Ìfà jẹ́ ìbátan tí ó yán tìkojá kan pàtó fún ìwọlé kọ̀ọ̀kan.

translation.source: Zero is represented by the symbol "0".
translation.target: Òdo tàbí òfo ni a fi àmì "0" ṣe àfihàn.

translation.source: The volume of a cylinder is the area of the base multiplied by the height.
translation.target: Àyè agolo jẹ́ òrò ìsàlẹ̀ lọ́nà ìsọdipúpọ̀ pẹ̀lú gíga.

translation.source: Two triangles are similar if their corresponding angles are equal.
translation.target: Anígunmẹ́ta méjì jẹ́ ìbáràjọ tí àwọn igun ìbámu wọn bá dọ́gba.

translation.source: A conic section is a curve obtained as the intersection of a plane and a double-napped cone.
translation.target: Abala kọ́nìkì jẹ́ kọ́fù tí a rí gẹ́gẹ́ bí ìpàdé pẹpẹ kan àti abala-méjì kọ́nù.

translation.source: The diameter of a circle is a line segment that passes through the center and connects two points on the boundary.
translation.target: Àlàjá ẹ̀ká jẹ́ àyè-ìlà tí ó la àárín kọjá tí ó sì so àwọn ojú méjì lára ìgbàtí pọ̀.

translation.source: The intersection of two sets A and B, denoted A ∩ B, contains all elements that are in both A and B.
translation.target: Ìpàdé àwọn ìtò méjì A àti B, tí a fì àmì hàn A ∩ B, ní gbogbo àwọn èròjà tí ó wà nínú A àti B.

translation.source: A path in a graph is a sequence of vertices such that each adjacent pair is connected by an edge.
translation.target: Ọ̀nà nínú àwòrán jẹ́ ìtẹ̀lé àwọn tẹ́tẹ́ tó bẹ́ẹ̀ tí ìwọ̀n tímọ́ kọ̀ọ̀kan jẹ́ sísopọ̀ nípa etí.

translation.source: The sum of an infinite geometric series with |r| < 1 is S = a₁/(1 - r), where a₁ is the first term and r is the common ratio.
translation.target: Àpapọ̀ ìtẹ̀lé àjé aláìlópin pẹ̀lú |r| < 1 jẹ́ S = a₁/(1 - r), níbi tí a₁ jẹ́ ẹ̀yà àkọ́kọ́ àti r jẹ́ ìbùpín àjọṣe.

translation.source: Derivatives measure the rate of change of a function with respect to its variable.
translation.target: Àwọn dérífátífù wọ́n ìyàsí ìyípadà ìfà pẹ̀lú ìfẹ̀sẹ̀ sí onídìmọ̀ rẹ̀.

translation.source: A weighted graph has a value associated with each edge.
translation.target: Àwòrán alániwọ̀n ní iye tí a ṣe àbáṣepọ̀ pẹ̀lú etí kọ̀ọ̀kan.

translation.source: A rectangle has four right angles and two pairs of equal, parallel sides.
translation.target: Àkòdi ní igun-ọ̀tún mẹ́rin àti àwọn ẹgbẹ́ dọ́gba, ọgbà méjì.

translation.source: The probability of a certain event is 1.
translation.target: Ìṣeéṣe ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ dájúdájú jẹ́ 1.

translation.source: The denominator is the number below the line in a fraction.
translation.target: Ìfipín ni òòkà tó wà lábẹ́ ìlà nínú ìdá-ẹsẹ.

translation.source: Two complementary angles add up to 90 degrees.
translation.target: Àwọn igun àfikún méjì ṣe àròpọ̀ sí àádọ́rùn-ún àléfà.

translation.source: The area of a triangle can also be calculated using the formula A = √(s(s-a)(s-b)(s-c)), where s = (a+b+c)/2 and a, b, and c are the lengths of the sides.
translation.target: Òrò onímẹ́ta tún le jẹ́ ṣíṣírò nípa lílo ìlànà A = √(s(s-a)(s-b)(s-c)), níbi tí s = (a+b+c)/2 àti a, b, àti c jẹ́ gígùn àwọn ẹgbẹ́.

translation.source: The laws of logarithms help simplify logarithmic expressions.
translation.target: Àwọn òfin ìdásí-tẹnbẹlú ńṣe ìrànlọ́wọ́ láti sọ àwọn àfihàn ìdásí-tẹnbẹlú di rírọ̀.

translation.source: Pi (π) is an irrational number that represents the ratio of a circle's circumference to its diameter.
translation.target: Pi (π) jẹ́ òòkà àìdéédé tí ó dúró fún ìbùpín odi-ẹ̀ká sí àlàjá rẹ̀.

translation.source: The quotient rule is used to find the derivative of the quotient of two functions.
translation.target: A lo òfin ìpín láti wá déríféétífù ìpín ìfà méjì.

translation.source: Logarithms are the inverse of exponential functions.
translation.target: Àwọn ìdásí-tẹnbẹlú jẹ́ ìdàpadà àwọn ìfà agbára.

translation.source: A function is increasing if its derivative is positive.
translation.target: Ìfà jẹ́ àlékún tí déríféétífù rẹ̀ bá jẹ́ àpọnlé.

translation.source: Optimization is the process of finding the maximum or minimum value of a function.
translation.target: Ìdára jẹ́ ìlànà wíwá iye púpọ̀jùlọ tàbí kéréjùlọ ìfà.

translation.source: A second-order differential equation involves the second derivative of the function.
translation.target: Ọ̀mì-ìyàtọ̀sọ́tọ̀ ìpele-kejì ní dérífátífù kejì ìfà náà.

translation.source: A Venn diagram is a graphical representation of sets.
translation.target: Àwòrán Vẹ́nù jẹ́ àfihàn àwọrán àwọn ìtò.

translation.source: Matrix multiplication is more complex than regular multiplication.
translation.target: Ìsọdipúpọ̀ ìtẹ́dúbùlè jẹ́ èyí tí ó ṣòro ju ìsọdipúpọ̀ déédé lọ.

translation.source: The inverse of a matrix A is denoted A⁻¹ and satisfies AA⁻¹ = A⁻¹A = I, where I is the identity matrix.
translation.target: Ìdàpadà ìtẹ́dúbùlè A ni a fì àmì hàn A⁻¹ tí ó sì mú AA⁻¹ = A⁻¹A = I ṣẹ, níbi tí I jẹ́ ìtẹ́dúbùlè ìṣedé.

translation.source: Subtraction is the process of finding the difference between two numbers.
translation.target: Ìyọkúrò jẹ́ ìgbésẹ̀ wíwá ìyàtọ̀ láàrín nọ́mbà méjì.

translation.source: A local maximum occurs at a critical point where the second derivative is negative.
translation.target: Àpọjù àbínibí ṣẹlẹ̀ ní ojúami pàtàkì níbi tí déríféétífù kejì jẹ́ àdínà.

translation.source: A cylinder has two parallel circular bases connected by a curved surface.
translation.target: Agolo ní àwọn ìsàlẹ̀ àyíká ọgbà méjì tí a so pọ̀ pẹ̀lú ojú títẹ̀.

translation.source: The determinant of a square matrix is a value that can be calculated from its elements.
translation.target: Olùdámọ̀ ìtẹ́dúbùlè alákòdì jẹ́ iye tí a le ṣírò láti àwọn èròjà rẹ̀.

translation.source: The indefinite integral of a function is a family of functions whose derivatives equal the original function.
translation.target: Ìtẹ́gùn àìpàtó ìfà jẹ́ ẹbí àwọn ìfà tí àwọn déríféétífù wọn dọ́gba ìfà àkọ́kọ́.

translation.source: Integrals are the antiderivatives of functions.
translation.target: Àwọn ìbúpa jẹ́ àntìdérífátífù àwọn ìfà.

translation.source: The range of a relation is the set of all second components of its ordered pairs.
translation.target: Àyè-kàn ìbátan jẹ́ ìtò gbogbo àwọn èròjà kejì àwọn ìwọ̀n tí a tò rẹ̀.

translation.source: The sum of two numbers is their total when added together.
translation.target: Àròpọ̀ àwọn òòkà méjì ni àpapọ̀ wọn nígbà tí a bá ṣe ìròpọ̀ wọn.

translation.source: The average speed is the total distance divided by the total time.
translation.target: Àròpín eré jẹ́ àpapọ̀ ìjìnnà pín pẹ̀lú àpapọ̀ àkókò.

translation.source: The least common multiple of 4 and 6 is 12.
translation.target: Ẹ̀sún kékeré àjọní 4 àti 6 jẹ́ 12.

translation.source: The inverse of a function reverses the input-output relationship.
translation.target: Ìdojúkọ ìfà yí ìbáṣepọ̀ àbáwọlé-àbájade padà.

translation.source: The binomial theorem gives the expansion of (a + b)ⁿ.
translation.target: Òfin ìdálẹ́jì fún wa ní ìgbóróṣẹ (a + b)ⁿ.

translation.source: A complex number has the form a + bi, where i is the square root of -1.
translation.target: Nọ́mbà àdàpọ̀ ní àwòṣe a + bi, níbi tí i jẹ́ irìn kejì -1.

translation.source: The midpoint of a line segment with endpoints (x₁, y₁) and (x₂, y₂) is ((x₁ + x₂)/2, (y₁ + y₂)/2).
translation.target: Àárínbá àyè-ìlà pẹ̀lú àwọn òpin (x₁, y₁) àti (x₂, y₂) jẹ́ ((x₁ + x₂)/2, (y₁ + y₂)/2).

translation.source: The vertex of a parabola is the point where the parabola changes direction.
translation.target: Tẹ́tẹ́ kọ́nú-fífà jẹ́ ojú níbi tí kọ́nú-fífà ńyí ìhà padà.

translation.source: A ray extends infinitely in one direction from a point.
translation.target: Ìtanná fẹ̀ láìlópin ní ìhà kan láti ojú kan.

translation.source: The standard deviation is the square root of the variance.
translation.target: Ìyàsọ́tọ̀ déédé jẹ́ gbòǹgbò onírìnméjì ìṣẹ̀lójà.

translation.source: A prime number is a natural number greater than 1 that cannot be formed by multiplying two smaller natural numbers.
translation.target: Òòkà àkọ́kọ́ jẹ́ òòkà ṣáà tí ó tóbi ju 1 lọ tí a kò lè ṣẹ̀dá nípa ìsọdipúpọ̀ àwọn òòkà ṣáà méjì tí ó kéré.

translation.source: A mathematical model is a description of a system using mathematical concepts and language.
translation.target: Àwòṣe ìṣirò jẹ́ àpèjúwe ètò nípa lílo àwọn èrò àti èdè ìṣirò.

translation.source: An isosceles triangle has two equal sides.
translation.target: Anígunmẹ́ta oníṣọ̀kan ní ẹ̀gbẹ́ méjì dọ́gba.

translation.source: A recursively defined sequence has each term defined in terms of one or more previous terms.
translation.target: Ìtẹ̀lé aṣàfihàn atẹyìnpadà ní ẹ̀yà kọ̀ọ̀kan tí a ṣàlàyé ní ọ̀nà ẹ̀yà kan tàbí jù bẹ́ẹ̀ lọ tẹ́lẹ̀.

translation.source: The range of a function is the set of all possible output values.
translation.target: Àbála ìfà jẹ́ àpapọ̀ gbogbo àwọn iye àbájade tó ṣeéṣe.

translation.source: The fundamental theorem of calculus connects differentiation and integration.
translation.target: Òfin ìpìlẹ̀ ìṣirò-ìyípadà so ìyàtọ̀sọ́tọ̀ àti ìbúlesẹ̀ pọ̀.

translation.source: A cone has a circular base connected to a point by a curved surface.
translation.target: Àkóńù ní ìsàlẹ̀ àyíká tí a so mọ́ ojú kan pẹ̀lú ojú títẹ̀.

translation.source: A line segment has two endpoints.
translation.target: Àájà ilà ní àwọn ojú-ìparí méjì.

translation.source: A hexagon has six sides.
translation.target: Oníhàmẹ́fà ní ẹ̀gbẹ́ mẹ́fà.

translation.source: Three multiplied by four equals twelve.
translation.target: Mẹ́ta lọ́nà mẹ́rin dọ́gba mẹ́jìlá.

translation.source: The range of a function is the set of all possible output values.
translation.target: Àyè-kàn ìfà jẹ́ ìtò gbogbo àwọn iye tìkojá tí ó ṣeéṣe.

translation.source: The circumference of a circle is the distance around it.
translation.target: Odi-ẹ̀ká jẹ́ ìjìnnà yíká ẹ̀ká náà.

translation.source: A normal distribution is a continuous probability distribution that is symmetric about its mean.
translation.target: Pínpín déédé jẹ́ pínpín ìṣeéṣe tíṣu tí ó jẹ́ bájẹ̀pẹ̀ nípa àròpín rẹ̀.

translation.source: The product of any number and zero is zero.
translation.target: Ẹ̀sún ìsọdipúpọ̀ òòkà kankan pẹ̀lú òdo jẹ́ òdo.

translation.source: Trigonometry is the study of relationships between the angles and sides of triangles.
translation.target: Ẹ̀kọ́ ìfidámẹ́ta jẹ́ ẹ̀kọ́ àwọn ìbáṣepọ̀ láàrín àwọn igun àti ẹgbẹ́ àwọn onímẹ́ta.

translation.source: Two lines are perpendicular if their slopes multiply to give -1.
translation.target: Ilà méjì jẹ́ ògìdo tí gẹ̀rẹ̀gẹ̀rẹ̀ wọn bá sọdi -1 nígbà tí a bá sọ wọ́n di púpọ̀.

translation.source: The standard deviation measures the amount of variation in a set of values.
translation.target: Àgbátẹnu-kúrò déédéé wọn iye ìyàtọ̀ nínú àpapọ̀ àwọn iye.

translation.source: The derivative of a constant is zero.
translation.target: Dérífátífù òòkà àìyẹ̀ jẹ́ òdo.

translation.source: A polynomial is an expression consisting of variables and coefficients using only addition, subtraction, and multiplication.
translation.target: Òṣùwọ̀npúpọ̀ jẹ́ àfihàn tí ó ní àwọn onídìmọ̀ àti àwọn ònkàwé tí ó ńlo àròpọ̀, àyọkúrò, àti ìsọdipúpọ̀ nìkan.

translation.source: A system of linear equations is a set of two or more linear equations.
translation.target: Ètò àwọn ọ̀mì-dogbá jẹ́ ìtò àwọn ọ̀mì-dogbá méjì tàbí jù bẹ́ẹ̀ lọ.

translation.source: A ratio compares two quantities.
translation.target: Ìbùpín ṣe àfiwé iye méjì.

translation.source: The tangent of an angle in a right triangle is the ratio of the opposite side to the adjacent side.
translation.target: Tangent igun nínú anígunmẹ́ta onígun-ọ̀tún jẹ́ ìbùpín ẹ̀gbẹ́ ìdojúkọ sí ẹ̀gbẹ́ ìbákan.

translation.source: Modular arithmetic is arithmetic for integers, where numbers "wrap around" when reaching a certain value.
translation.target: Ìṣirò akanúnrín jẹ́ ìṣirò fún àwọn òòkà odidi, níbi tí àwọn òòkà "yí padà" nígbà tí wọ́n bá dé iye kan.

translation.source: An acute angle is less than 90 degrees.
translation.target: Igun mímú kéré ju àléfà mẹ́sàn-án (90) lọ.

translation.source: The difference between 8 and 3 is 5.
translation.target: Ìyàtọ̀ láàrín mẹ́jọ àti mẹ́ta jẹ́ márùn-ún.

translation.source: The degree of a vertex is the number of edges connected to it.
translation.target: Ìpele tẹ́tẹ́ jẹ́ iye àwọn etí tí a sọpọ̀ mọ́ ọ.

translation.source: The radius of a circle is the distance from the center to any point on the boundary.
translation.target: Igbó ẹ̀ká jẹ́ ìjìnnà láti àárín dé ojúkọ́jọ́ lára ìgbàtí.

translation.source: The sum of the exterior angles of any polygon is 360 degrees.
translation.target: Àpapọ̀ àwọn igun òde oníhàpúpọ̀ jẹ́ àléfà ọ̀ọ́dúnrún àti ọgọ́ta (360).

translation.source: Mathematics is the study of numbers, shapes, and patterns.
translation.target: Ìṣirò jẹ́ ẹ̀kọ́ nípa òǹkà, àwọn àwòṣe, àti àwọn ìlànà.

translation.source: A hyperbola is a conic section formed when a plane intersects both halves of a double-napped cone.
translation.target: Háípábólà jẹ́ abala kọ́nìkì tí a ṣẹ̀dá nígbà tí pẹpẹ bá da àwọn ààbọ̀ méjèèjì abala-méjì kọ́nù.

translation.source: A linear differential equation has the dependent variable and all its derivatives occurring with power 1.
translation.target: Ọ̀mì-ìyàtọ̀sọ́tọ̀ dogbá ní onídìmọ̀ aláṣeégbé àti gbogbo àwọn dérífátífù rẹ̀ tí ó farahàn pẹ̀lú agbára 1.

translation.source: A matrix is a rectangular array of numbers.
translation.target: Mátríìsì jẹ́ ẹgbẹ́ oláriwọ́ àwọn nọ́mbà.

translation.source: Matrix addition is performed by adding corresponding elements.
translation.target: Àròpọ̀ ìtẹ́dúbùlè ni a ṣe nípa fífi àwọn èròjà tí ó bára mu kún ara wọn.

translation.source: A relation is a set of ordered pairs.
translation.target: Ìbátan jẹ́ ìtò àwọn ìwọ̀n tí a tò.

translation.source: The Fibonacci sequence starts with 0 and 1, and each subsequent number is the sum of the two preceding ones.
translation.target: Ìṣísẹ̀lẹ̀ Fibonacci bẹ̀rẹ̀ pẹ̀lú 0 àti 1, àti pé ọ̀kọ̀ọ̀kan nọ́mbà tó tẹ̀le jẹ́ àpapọ̀ méjì tí ó ṣáájú.

translation.source: A linear function can be written in the form f(x) = mx + b.
translation.target: Ìfà-dogbá le jẹ́ kíkọ ní ọ̀nà f(x) = mx + b.

translation.source: The scalar product of two vectors gives a scalar value.
translation.target: Ìpo onískalà méjì fún iye onískalà.

translation.source: Probability is expressed as a value between 0 and 1.
translation.target: Ìwọ̀n Iṣe-éṣe jẹ́ ìfihàn gẹ́gẹ́ bí iye láàrín 0 àti 1.

translation.source: The sum of the interior angles of a polygon with n sides is (n-2) × 180 degrees.
translation.target: Àpapọ̀ àwọn igun inú oníhàkìíhà pẹ̀lú ẹ̀gbẹ́ n jẹ́ (n-2) × 180 àléfà.

translation.source: The perimeter of a shape is the distance around it.
translation.target: Àyíká eeyà jẹ́ ìjìnnà yíká rẹ̀.

translation.source: The Pythagorean identity states that sin²θ + cos²θ = 1.
translation.target: Ìdánimọ̀ Pythagoras sọ pé sin²θ + cos²θ = 1.

translation.source: The total surface area of a rectangular prism is 2(lw + lh + wh), where l is the length, w is the width, and h is the height.
translation.target: Àtọ̀wọ́dà òrò àkòdì-ìdẹ̀ jẹ́ 2(lw + lh + wh), níbi tí l jẹ́ gígùn, w jẹ́ ìbú, àti h jẹ́ gíga.

translation.source: An arithmetic sequence has a common difference between consecutive terms.
translation.target: Ìtẹ̀lé ìṣirò ní ìyàtọ̀ àjọṣe láàrín àwọn ẹ̀yà tó tẹ̀lé ara wọn.

translation.source: The value of pi is approximately 3.14159.
translation.target: Iye pi jẹ́ nípérédé 3.14159.

translation.source: A planar graph can be drawn on a plane without any edges crossing.
translation.target: Àwòrán apẹpẹ lè jẹ́ yíya lórí pẹpẹ láìsí àwọn etí dídà.

translation.source: The probability of the union of two events is P(A ∪ B) = P(A) + P(B) - P(A ∩ B).
translation.target: Ìṣeéṣe àpapọ̀ àwọn ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ méjì jẹ́ P(A ∪ B) = P(A) + P(B) - P(A ∩ B).

translation.source: A parabola is a conic section formed when a plane intersects a cone parallel to a line on the cone.
translation.target: Kọ́nú-fífà jẹ́ abala kọ́nìkì tí a ṣẹ̀dá nígbà tí pẹpẹ bá da kọ́nù ní ọgbà sí ìlà lórí kọ́nù náà.

translation.source: A fraction has a numerator and a denominator.
translation.target: Ìdàsíwẹ́wẹ́ ní ètò-òkè àti ètò-ìsàlẹ̀.

translation.source: The least common multiple (LCM) of two integers is the smallest positive integer that is divisible by both.
translation.target: Pínpín àjọṣe kéréjùlọ (LCM) àwọn òòkà odidi méjì jẹ́ òòkà odidi dáradára kéréjùlọ tí ó lè jẹ́ pínpín nípa méjèèjì.

translation.source: Division is the process of sharing a quantity into equal parts.
translation.target: Pínpín jẹ́ ìgbésẹ̀ pínpín iye kan sí àwọn ìpín dọ́gba.

translation.source: Subtraction is removing a number from another to find the difference.
translation.target: Àyọkúrò jẹ́ ìmúkúrò òòkà kan láti inú èkejì láti rí ìyàtọ̀ wọn.

translation.source: A rhombus has four equal sides.
translation.target: Àkòdì-títẹ̀ ní ẹ̀gbẹ́ mẹ́rin dọ́gba.

translation.source: The sum of a finite arithmetic series is S = n(a₁ + aₙ)/2, where n is the number of terms, a₁ is the first term, and aₙ is the last term.
translation.target: Àpapọ̀ ìtẹ̀lé ìṣirò tó ní òpin jẹ́ S = n(a₁ + aₙ)/2, níbi tí n jẹ́ iye àwọn ẹ̀yà, a₁ jẹ́ ẹ̀yà àkọ́kọ́, àti aₙ jẹ́ ẹ̀yà tó gbẹ̀yìn.

translation.source: The equation of a line can be written in the form y = mx + b.
translation.target: Ọ̀mì ìlà le jẹ́ kíkọ ní ọ̀nà y = mx + b.

translation.source: The chain rule is used to find the derivative of a composite function.
translation.target: Òfin ẹ̀wọ́n ni a ńlo láti wá dérífátífù ìfà àdàpọ̀.

translation.source: The empty set, denoted ∅, contains no elements.
translation.target: Ìtò òfìfo, tí a fì àmì hàn ∅, kò ní èròjà kankan.

translation.source: A straight angle measures exactly 180 degrees.
translation.target: Igun tíṣàn jẹ́ àléfà ọgọ́jọ (180).

translation.source: The limit of a function describes its behavior as the input approaches a particular value.
translation.target: Òpin ìfà ṣàpèjúwe ìwà rẹ̀ bí àbáwọlé ṣe ń súnmọ́ iye kan pàtó.

translation.source: The volume of a sphere is V = (4/3)πr³, where r is the radius.
translation.target: Àyè òṣùṣù jẹ́ V = (4/3)πr³, níbi tí r jẹ́ igbó.

translation.source: A right angle measures exactly 90 degrees.
translation.target: Igun-ọ̀tún jẹ́ àléfà mẹ́sàn-án (90).

translation.source: In a fraction, the numerator is the number above the line.
translation.target: Nínú ìdá-ẹsẹ, ẹ̀sún ni òòkà tó wà lókè ìlà náà.

translation.source: A connected graph has a path between every pair of vertices.
translation.target: Àwòrán asọpọ̀ ní ọ̀nà láàrín ìwọ̀n tẹ́tẹ́ kọ̀ọ̀kan.

translation.source: The square root of nine is three.
translation.target: Irìn kejì mẹ́sàn-án jẹ́ mẹ́ta.

translation.source: The graph of a linear equation is a straight line.
translation.target: Gíráàfù òfin onírín-kan jẹ́ ilà tààrà.

translation.source: A Nash equilibrium is a stable state in a game where no player can gain by unilaterally changing their strategy.
translation.target: Ìdógba Nási jẹ́ ipò ìdúró nínú ere níbi tí kò sí ẹlẹ́rẹ tí ó lè jèrè nípa yíyi ìlànà-ẹ̀rí wọn padà lẹ́kansoso.

translation.source: Compound interest includes interest on the accumulated interest.
translation.target: Èlélé ní àfikún èlé lórí èlé tí a ti kójọ.

translation.source: Solve for x in the equation 2x + 5 = 13.
translation.target: Ṣe ojútùú fún x nínú òfin 2x + 5 = 13.

translation.source: The Pythagorean theorem relates the sides of a right-angled triangle.
translation.target: Àkàwé Pythagoras ṣe àlàyé ìbáṣepọ̀ àwọn ẹ̀gbẹ́ anígunmẹ́ta onígun-ọ̀tún.

translation.source: The volume of a sphere is (4/3)π multiplied by the cube of the radius.
translation.target: Àyè òṣùṣù jẹ́ (4/3)π lọ́nà ìsọdipúpọ̀ pẹ̀lú onírìnmẹ́ta igbó.

translation.source: Calculate the area of a triangle with base 6 cm and height 4 cm.
translation.target: Ṣèṣirò òrò anígunmẹ́ta pẹ̀lú ìpìlẹ̀ 6 cm àti ìga 4 cm.

translation.source: A global minimum is the lowest point on the entire function.
translation.target: Àkéréjùlọ akáríayé jẹ́ ojú kéré jùlọ lórí gbogbo ìfà náà.

translation.source: Multiplication means adding a number to itself a specific number of times.
translation.target: Ìsọdipúpọ̀ túmọ̀ sí fífi òòkà kan kún ara rẹ̀ ní iye ìgbà kan pàtó.

translation.source: An initial value problem is a differential equation together with a set of initial conditions.
translation.target: Ìyọnu iye-ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ jẹ́ ọ̀mì-ìyàtọ̀sọ́tọ̀ pẹ̀lú ìtò àwọn ipò ìbẹ̀rẹ̀.

translation.source: The sum of the interior angles of a triangle is 180 degrees.
translation.target: Àpapọ̀ àwọn igun inú onímẹ́ta jẹ́ àléfà ọgọ́jọ (180).

translation.source: A cube is a three-dimensional shape with six equal square faces.
translation.target: Ìgọ̀n jẹ́ èèyà olópomẹ́ta pẹ̀lú ojú àkòdì mẹ́fà dọ́gba.

translation.source: What is the highest common factor of 12 and 18?
translation.target: Kí ni ìfipín nlá àjọní fún méjìlá àti méjìdínlógún?

translation.source: A function is a relation where each element in the domain corresponds to exactly one element in the range.
translation.target: Ìfà jẹ́ ìbátan níbi tí èròjà kọ̀ọ̀kan nínú àdúgbò bá ẹ̀yà kan pàtó nínú àyè-kàn mu.

translation.source: The chain rule is used to find the derivative of a composite function.
translation.target: A lo òfin ẹ̀wọ̀n láti wá déríféétífù ìfà àdàpọ̀.

translation.source: In a proportion, the product of the means equals the product of the extremes.
translation.target: Nínú ìbámu, ẹ̀sún àwọn aarin dọ́gba ẹ̀sún àwọn òpin.

translation.source: The cross product of two vectors is a vector.
translation.target: Ìsọdipúpọ̀ àgbéjáde àwọn ògún méjì jẹ́ ògún.

translation.source: The variance of a set of numbers measures how spread out the values are.
translation.target: Ìṣẹ̀lójà ìtò òòkà kan wọn bí àwọn iye ṣe tànká sí.

translation.source: The area of a triangle can be calculated using the formula A = (1/2)bh, where b is the base and h is the height.
translation.target: Òrò onímẹ́ta le jẹ́ ṣíṣírò nípa lílo ìlànà A = (1/2)bh, níbi tí b jẹ́ ìsàlẹ̀ àti h jẹ́ gíga.

translation.source: The formula for the volume of a cube is side length cubed.
translation.target: Òfin fún àyè ìgọ̀n jẹ́ ìgùn lẹ́ẹ̀mẹ́ta.

translation.source: A partial differential equation involves partial derivatives of a function of several variables.
translation.target: Ọ̀mì-ìyàtọ̀sọ́tọ̀ abẹ́lé ní àwọn dérífátífù abẹ́lé ìfà àwọn onídìmọ̀ púpọ̀.

translation.source: A global maximum is the highest point on the entire function.
translation.target: Àgbàjùlọ akáríayé jẹ́ ojú gíga jùlọ lórí gbogbo ìfà náà.

translation.source: An odd function satisfies f(-x) = -f(x) for all x in its domain.
translation.target: Ìfà òrìtú mú f(-x) = -f(x) ṣẹ fún gbogbo x nínú àdúgbò rẹ̀.

translation.source: A complete graph has an edge between every pair of vertices.
translation.target: Àwòrán pípé ní etí láàrín ìwọ̀n tẹ́tẹ́ kọ̀ọ̀kan.

translation.source: The probability of the intersection of two independent events is P(A ∩ B) = P(A) × P(B).
translation.target: Ìṣeéṣe ìpàdé àwọn ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ olómìnira méjì jẹ́ P(A ∩ B) = P(A) × P(B).

translation.source: A prism is a polyhedron with two parallel, congruent faces.
translation.target: Ìdẹ̀ jẹ́ olójúpúpọ̀ pẹ̀lú ojú ọgbà, bájẹ̀pẹ̀ méjì.

translation.source: The exterior angles of a polygon sum to 360 degrees.
translation.target: Àwọn igun òde oníhàkìíhà ṣe àròpọ̀ sí àádọ́rin àléfà.

translation.source: The sum of the interior angles of a quadrilateral is 360 degrees.
translation.target: Àpapọ̀ àwọn igun inú onímẹ́rin jẹ́ àléfà ọ̀ọ́dúnrún àti ọgọ́ta (360).

translation.source: The Pythagorean theorem states that in a right triangle, the square of the hypotenuse equals the sum of the squares of the other two sides.
translation.target: Òfin Pítágórà sọ pé nínú igun-ọ̀tún onímẹ́ta, onírìnméjì ẹgbẹ́ gígajùlọ dọ́gba pẹ̀lú àpapọ̀ àwọn onírìnméjì méjì ẹgbẹ́ yòókù.

translation.source: A geometric sequence has a common ratio between consecutive terms.
translation.target: Ìtẹ̀lé àjé ní ìbùpín àjọṣe láàrín àwọn ẹ̀yà tó tẹ̀lé ara wọn.

translation.source: In an arithmetic sequence, each term is found by adding a constant to the previous term.
translation.target: Nínú ìṣísẹ̀lẹ̀ oníṣirò, a rí ìpín kọ̀ọ̀kan nípa fífi óǹkà dịẹ̀ kún ìpín tí ó ṣáájú.

translation.source: Two events are independent if the occurrence of one does not affect the probability of the other.
translation.target: Ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ méjì jẹ́ alálàáwọ̀ tí ìṣẹlẹ̀ ọ̀kan kò bá ní ipa lórí ìwọ̀n iṣe-éṣe èkejì.

translation.source: The sum of two numbers is called addition.
translation.target: Àròpọ̀ òǹkà méjì ni a pè ní ìṣesípọ̀.

translation.source: In statistics, the median is the middle value of a data set.
translation.target: Nínú ẹ̀kọ́ òǹkàdẹ̀rí, aarin jẹ́ iye àárín àpapọ̀ dátà.

translation.source: The distance formula between two points (x₁,y₁) and (x₂,y₂) is √[(x₂-x₁)² + (y₂-y₁)²].
translation.target: Òfin ìjìnnà láàrín ojúami méjì (x₁,y₁) àti (x₂,y₂) jẹ́ √[(x₂-x₁)² + (y₂-y₁)²].

translation.source: The mode of a set of numbers is the value that appears most frequently.
translation.target: Ìgbàjù ìtò òòkà kan jẹ́ iye tí ó farahàn lọ́pọ̀lọpọ̀ jùlọ.

translation.source: A pentagon has five sides.
translation.target: Oníhàmárùn ní ẹ̀gbẹ́ márùn-ún.

translation.source: A set is a collection of distinct objects.
translation.target: Ìtò jẹ́ àkójọ àwọn nkan ọ̀tọ̀ọ̀tọ̀.

translation.source: A function is continuous at a point if its limit exists at that point and equals the function value.
translation.target: Ìfà jẹ́ ìkànsímúlẹ̀ ní ojúami kan tí òpin rẹ̀ bá wà ní ojúami náà tí ó sì dọ́gba iye ìfà náà.

translation.source: The modulus of a complex number is its distance from the origin.
translation.target: Módúlù nọ́mbà àdàpọ̀ jẹ́ ìjìnnà rẹ̀ láti ìbẹ̀rẹ̀.

translation.source: The union of two sets A and B, denoted A ∪ B, contains all elements that are in A or B or both.
translation.target: Àpapọ̀ àwọn ìtò méjì A àti B, tí a fì àmì hàn A ∪ B, ní gbogbo àwọn èròjà tí ó wà nínú A tàbí B tàbí méjèèjì.

translation.source: The prime factorization of a number is the product of its prime factors.
translation.target: Ìsọdipúpọ̀ àkọ́kọ́ òòkà kan jẹ́ ìsọdipúpọ̀ àwọn àkọkọ ìpín rẹ̀.

translation.source: A whole number is called an integer.
translation.target: Nọ́mbà odidi ni a ń pè ní integer.

translation.source: The cosine of an angle in a right triangle is the ratio of the adjacent side to the hypotenuse.
translation.target: Cosine igun nínú anígunmẹ́ta onígun-ọ̀tún jẹ́ ìbùpín ẹ̀gbẹ́ ìbákan sí hypotenuse.

translation.source: A linear equation in two variables has the form ax + by = c.
translation.target: Ọ̀mì-dogbá nínú àwọn onídìmọ̀ méjì ní ọ̀nà ax + by = c.

translation.source: The distance between two points (x₁, y₁) and (x₂, y₂) is given by the formula √[(x₂ - x₁)² + (y₂ - y₁)²].
translation.target: Ìjìnnà láàrín àwọn ojú méjì (x₁, y₁) àti (x₂, y₂) ni a fún nípa ìlànà √[(x₂ - x₁)² + (y₂ - y₁)²].

translation.source: A Euler circuit is a path that traverses each edge of a graph exactly once and returns to the starting vertex.
translation.target: Àyíká Yúlà jẹ́ ọ̀nà tí ó la etí kọ̀ọ̀kan àwòrán kọjá ẹ̀ẹ̀kan pàtó tí ó sì padà sí tẹ́tẹ́ ìbẹ̀rẹ̀.

translation.source: An angle is formed by two rays with a common endpoint.
translation.target: Igun jẹ́ ohun tí a ṣẹ̀dá láti ìtanná méjì pẹ̀lú ojú ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ kan.

translation.source: A spanning tree is a tree that includes all vertices of a graph.
translation.target: Igi afáralọ́lá jẹ́ igi tí ó ní gbogbo àwọn tẹ́tẹ́ àwòrán.

translation.source: A function is differentiable at a point if its derivative exists at that point.
translation.target: Ìfà jẹ́ aláyàtọ̀sọ́tọ̀ ní ojú kan bí dérífátífù rẹ̀ bá wà ní ojú náà.

translation.source: In a straight line, all adjacent angles sum to 180 degrees.
translation.target: Ní ilà tààrà, gbogbo àwọn igun aládùúgbò ṣe àròpọ̀ sí ọgọ́ọ̀rùn-ún ó lé ọgọ́tin àléfà.

translation.source: A prime number is divisible only by 1 and itself.
translation.target: Nọ́mbà àkọ́kọ́ pín nípasẹ̀ 1 àti ara rẹ̀ nìkan.

translation.source: The axis of symmetry of a parabola is the vertical line that passes through the vertex.
translation.target: Ọ̀pọ̀n ìjọra kọ́nú-fífà jẹ́ ìlà tíṣàn tí ó la tẹ́tẹ́ kọjá.

translation.source: The tangent of an angle in a right triangle is the ratio of the opposite side to the adjacent side.
translation.target: Tánijẹ́ntì igun kan nínú igun-ọ̀tún onímẹ́ta jẹ́ ìbùpín ẹgbẹ́ kejì sí ẹgbẹ́ tímọ́.

translation.source: A mathematical proof is a rigorous argument that establishes the truth of a statement.
translation.target: Ìdánilójú ìṣirò jẹ́ àríyànjiyàn lílágbára tí ó fi òtítọ́ gbólóhùn múlẹ̀.

translation.source: The sine of an angle in a right triangle is the ratio of the opposite side to the hypotenuse.
translation.target: Sáínù igun kan nínú igun-ọ̀tún onímẹ́ta jẹ́ ìbùpín ẹgbẹ́ kejì sí ẹgbẹ́ gígajùlọ.

translation.source: The domain of a function is the set of all possible input values.
translation.target: Àdúgbò ìfà jẹ́ ìtò gbogbo àwọn iye ìwọlé tí ó ṣeéṣe.

translation.source: Zero divided by any non-zero number is zero.
translation.target: Òdo pín pẹ̀lú èyíkéyìí nọ́mbà àìòdo jẹ́ òdo.

translation.source: Logarithms are the inverse of exponents.
translation.target: Lógarítímù jẹ́ ìdojúkọ àwọn òṣónídìí.

translation.source: The dot product of two vectors is a scalar.
translation.target: Ìsọdipúpọ̀ àyè-tó àwọn ògún méjì jẹ́ òṣùwọ̀n.

translation.source: A complex number has the form a + bi, where a and b are real numbers and i is the imaginary unit.
translation.target: Òòkà àdàpọ̀ ní ọ̀nà a + bi, níbi tí a àti b jẹ́ àwọn òòkà gidi àti i jẹ́ ẹ̀yà àfojúró.

translation.source: The formula for the area of a circle is pi times radius squared.
translation.target: Òfin fún òrò ẹ̀ká jẹ́ pi fún igbó ẹ̀ká lẹ́ẹ̀méjì.

translation.source: The volume of a cone is one-third the area of the base multiplied by the height.
translation.target: Àyè àkóńù jẹ́ ìdá-mẹ́ta òrò ìsàlẹ̀ lọ́nà ìsọdipúpọ̀ pẹ̀lú gíga.

translation.source: Gaussian elimination is a method for solving systems of linear equations.
translation.target: Ìmúkúrò Gáúsiánù jẹ́ ọ̀nà fún yíyanǹjú àwọn ètò ọ̀mì-dogbá.

translation.source: Matrices are rectangular arrays of numbers arranged in rows and columns.
translation.target: Àwọn ìtẹ́dúbùlè jẹ́ àkójọ òṣùwọ̀n àwọn nọ́mbà tí a to ní àwọn ìlà àti àwọn ọ̀wọ́n.

translation.source: Game theory is the study of mathematical models of strategic interaction between rational decision-makers.
translation.target: Ẹ̀kọ́ ere jẹ́ ẹ̀kọ́ àwọn àwòṣe ìṣirò ìbáṣepọ̀ àdájọ láàrín àwọn olùpinnu aláròjinlẹ̀.

translation.source: A sequence is an ordered list of numbers.
translation.target: Ìtẹ̀lé jẹ́ àkọjọ àwọn òòkà tí a tò.

translation.source: A trapezoid is a quadrilateral with exactly one pair of parallel sides.
translation.target: Amúgàga jẹ́ onímẹ́rin tí ó ní ẹgbẹ́ ọgbà bájẹ̀pẹ̀ ìkan.

translation.source: When we divide by zero, the result is undefined.
translation.target: Nígbà tí a bá pín pẹ̀lú òdo, èsì kò ní ìtumọ̀.

translation.source: The area of a rectangle is length multiplied by width.
translation.target: Òrò àkòdi jẹ́ gígùn lọ́nà ìsọdipúpọ̀ pẹ̀lú ìbú.

translation.source: The cross product of two vectors gives another vector.
translation.target: Ìpo ẹ̀yọ méjì fún fẹ́ktọ̀ mìíràn.

translation.source: The sine of an angle in a right triangle is the ratio of the opposite side to the hypotenuse.
translation.target: Sine igun nínú anígunmẹ́ta onígun-ọ̀tún jẹ́ ìbùpín ẹ̀gbẹ́ ìdojúkọ sí hypotenuse.

translation.source: The volume of a rectangular prism is V = lwh, where l is the length, w is the width, and h is the height.
translation.target: Àyè àkòdì-ìdẹ̀ jẹ́ V = lwh, níbi tí l jẹ́ gígùn, w jẹ́ ìbú, àti h jẹ́ gíga.

translation.source: Addition is one of the four basic operations of arithmetic.
translation.target: Àròpọ̀ jẹ́ ọ̀kan lára àwọn ọṣẹ́ ìpilẹ̀ mẹ́rin ti ìṣirò.

translation.source: A theorem is a statement that has been proven on the basis of previously established statements.
translation.target: Òfin jẹ́ gbólóhùn tí a ti ṣe ìdánilójú lórí ìpìlẹ̀ à

translation.source: To find the mean, add all values and divide by the number of values.
translation.target: Láti wá àròpín, ṣe àpapọ̀ gbogbo àwọn iye kí o sì pín pẹ̀lú iye àwọn nọ́mbà náà.

translation.source: The cosine of an angle in a right triangle is the ratio of the adjacent side to the hypotenuse.
translation.target: Kósáìnù igun kan nínú igun-ọ̀tún onímẹ́ta jẹ́ ìbùpín ẹgbẹ́ tímọ́ sí ẹgbẹ́ gígajùlọ.

translation.source: The tangent to a circle touches the circle at exactly one point.
translation.target: Dotun-ẹ̀ká kan fọwọ́ kan ẹ̀ká náà ní ojúami kan péré.

translation.source: The binomial theorem gives the expansion of (a + b)^n.
translation.target: Àkàwé báìnómíà fún ìgbórí (a + b)^n.

translation.source: The domain of a relation is the set of all first components of its ordered pairs.
translation.target: Àdúgbò ìbátan jẹ́ ìtò gbogbo àwọn èròjà àkọ́kọ́ àwọn ìwọ̀n tí a tò rẹ̀.

translation.source: Euler's formula states that e^(iπ) + 1 = 0.
translation.target: Òfin Euler sọ pé e^(iπ) + 1 = 0.
